Detailed Description

Device profile persistor class that stores in a password AES GCM encrypted file.

See also
DeviceProfilePersistor

Property Documentation

◆ AuthDataBytes

array< byte>^ IonicSecurity::SDK::DeviceProfilePersistorAesGcm::AuthDataBytes
getset

The AES GCM Additional Authenticated Data (AAD)

Parameters
[in]mpbyAuthDataPointer to the Additional Authenticated Data (AAD) byte array. If empty, no AAD will be used.

When setting the AES GCM Additional Authenticated Data (AAD), if any problem occurs an SdkException is thrown.

◆ AuthDataHex

String^ IonicSecurity::SDK::DeviceProfilePersistorAesGcm::AuthDataHex
set

The AES GCM Additional Authenticated Data (AAD) as a hex encoded string.

Parameters
[in]mwsAddAuthDataHexThe Additional Authenticated Data (AAD) string.

◆ KeyBytes

array< System:: Byte>^ IonicSecurity::SDK::DeviceProfilePersistorAesGcm::KeyBytes
getset

The AES cipher key.

Parameters
[in]mpbyCipherKeyThe key buffer. The key length should always be equal to AesGcmCipher::CipherKeyLen().

◆ KeyHex

String^ IonicSecurity::SDK::DeviceProfilePersistorAesGcm::KeyHex
set

The AES cipher key from a hex encoded string.

Parameters
[in]mwsCipherKeyHexThe hex key string. The decoded key length should always be equal to AesGcmCipher::CipherKeyLen().
